author: nicks45589
title: Go-Peds Go-Cardano
description: For blockchain to achieve global adoption, we need to start educating the next generation now. But how can you make kids interested in it?
solution: Create a youth organization that captivates them with go-ped racing while also educating them about blockchain, finance, and Cardano.
experience: We are a team of go-ped and Cardano enthusiasts, who have been working with kids for years and build and race go-peds as a hobby.
